price: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa wani Manzo daga gare su, ya jẽmusu, sai suka ƙaryata shi, sabõda haka azãba ta kãma su, alhãli kuwa sũ ne mãsu zãlunci.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāahum rasūlun min'hum fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu wahum ẓālimūna
